channel.title: Jedr's Blog
channel.description: Blog by Jedr Blaszyk. Bikepacking, photography & tech.

item.title: Norway Bikepacking: Trondheim to Bergen
item.description: Cycling from Trondheim to Bergen in 10 days. 1000km and 14,000m of elevation gain. Fjords, ferries and glaciers.
item.content:encoded: (This is an article posted to my blog. You can read it online by clicking here.)

item.title: Iceland 4x4 Roadtrip
item.description: Unique landscapes, smouldering volcanoes and blue glaciers complemented by Reykjavik coffee culture.
item.content:encoded: (This is an article posted to my blog. You can read it online by clicking here.)

item.title: Fly-in hike around Isle of Wight
item.description: Making the best out of the Platinum Jubilee weekend. Flying to Bebridge with tent, hiking for 3 days to the Needles.
item.content:encoded: (This is an article posted to my blog. You can read it online by clicking here.)

item.title: Kattegat loop, Denmark and Sweden

item.title: Bikepacking & wild camping in Sweden
item.description: Baltic Sea, lakes and forests - 8 days of bikepacking and wild camping adventure.

item.title: Geometric Deep Learning - an overview
item.description: Series of posts covering learnings from my MEng thesis "Geometric Deep Learning for Subcortical Brain Shape Analysis".

item.title: My take on cycling in London
item.description: Looking for a great cycling route to escape the city with? Here are my personal favourites to get some miles in during the coronavirus lockdown.

item.title: Sussex Coastal Marathon
item.description: My first marathon. Hilly, muddy and windy race, definitely worth it.
